name: How's everyone doing tonight?
description:
Come check on the regulars!

Use 'Z' to zoom in, 'X' to zoom out and press and hold 'SPACE' to listen in.

Use movement arrows to move your view. 

Inspired by Aristotle Roufanis: https://aristotle.photography/

Font sources:

https://www.dafont.com/godzilla.font by Bill Bussone

https://www.dafont.com/spooky-regime.font by Md Shohail Bhuian

https://www.dafont.com/lemon-friday.font by 

Nuun Creatype

https://www.dafont.com/stream.font by Hardiboy Design

Camera sound sources:

Camera zoom https://freesound.org/people/kwahmah_02/sounds/264105/

Camera move https://freesound.org/people/sheepfilms/sounds/154795/

Ambient sound: https://freesound.org/people/Soundkrampf/sounds/237329/

Posters sources:

Godzilla poster: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt3741700/

King kong poster: http://printstore.bfi.org.uk/classic-film-posters/poster-merian-c-coopers-king-k...
